title: NO DEVICE DANGER
content: Parents don’t need to worry about their shiny new smartphone, thanks to Biba’s “refereed” play mode. The device never leaves the caregiver’s hands and lets parents be an active part of the fun.

title: INCLUSIVE PLAY
content: Biba games are designed so that every child can easily join in the fun, regardless of any possible limitations on their mobility. That’s the way it should be… because Biba games are for everyone!

title: GAMES ARE ALWAYS FREE
content: Mom and Dad don’t need to worry about being nickel-and-dimed for every new game. Biba games are always free and have been certified as fully family friendly by Google Play!
